items.sentence: He was very worried about having to spend Christmas in the hospital.
Tom thinks that Mary won\'t be able to pay all her bills this month.
I know your time is valuable, but could I ask you just one question?
Tom was glad he didn\'t have to live in Boston for more than a year.
Tom couldn\'t remember the punch line of the joke he wanted to tell.
Tom said he had a stomachache and didn\'t feel like eating anything.
I can\'t tell you how much I\'ve been looking forward to your visit.
All I want to do is sit here and drink this bottle of wine with you.
Americans like football in the same way that Japanese like baseball.
I doubt that Tom has the courage to do what really needs to be done.
We\'d like to thank you for taking the time to answer our questions.
Why isn\'t there any wine left in the bottle? Did you kids drink it?
I really can\'t remember people\'s names, but I don\'t forget faces.
Tom had to walk to school today because his bicycle had a flat tire.
Tom has been getting a busy signal every time he tries to call Mary.
Tom is a good employee. He gets things done quickly and efficiently.
Tom saw Mary standing by the fireplace and went over to talk to her.
Tom was reading the sports page when Mary came into the living room.
Tom was sitting at home in his pajamas watching TV and eating pizza.
Tom was studying French in the library the last time that I saw him.
